body: Job Responsibilities:1.Prepare technical service solutions and strategies for networking implementation.2.Provide network design, commissioning, integration, acceptance and migration technical service for networking products and solutions.3.Handle the networking technical problems reported by customers or other support organizations.4.Deliver validation testing for networking products, functions and features by collaborating with customer and R&D.General Requirements:1.Demand an academic degree minimum on bachelor degree in telecommunications, information technology, information engineering, computer science, applied electronics, automatic control and other relevant area.2.Require more than 2 years experience in telecommunication, information technology, or other relevant area.3.Need good communication and presentation skills in English language.4.Need excellent teamwork abilities and interpersonal skills.5.Need adaptability for participating projects aboard.Professional Requirements:1.Understand the telecommunication fundaments and principles: Routing, Switching, WDM, SDH, MPLS, xDSL, FTTx.2.Familiar with networking operation and maintenance on: Router, Switch, Firewall, RTN, OSN, DSLAM.3.Have experience on networking implementation or testing. (Optional)
title: Global Technical Service Engineer-Network Product
locations: Barbu Vacarescu Bld. 301-311, București, Municipiul București, România
